jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Provide financial and strategic analysis on major decisions related to the Company’s funding strategy, M&A opportunities, partnership arrangements and strategic initiatives
  • Develop financial models and valuation analyses that help guide the decision making process
  • Conduct industry and market research related to trends, risks, opportunities and competitive landscape
  • Conduct due diligence for potential transactions and coordinate with finance, legal, tax and other departments to ensure seamless deal execution
  • Create investment memorandums and related presentations for review by senior management team
  • Prepare regular and ad-hoc investor and management reporting

• 1-3 years of work experience in private equity, M&A advisory, investment banking or management consulting
  • Good grasp of accounting and finance knowledge
  • Excellent analytical, critical thinking and problem-solving skills with high levels of attention to details
  • Works well under pressure to achieve tight timelines while producing high quality outputs
  • Strong organizational skills with the ability to multi-task
  • Bachelor’s Degree
  • Excellent verbal and written skills in English. Fluency in Bahasa Indonesia is a plus.
  • Advanced proficiency in MS-Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint
